segments.text: Good morning , I made an appointment with Dr . Smith , but I have to change it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you made your appointment , what day did you choose ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At what time was that appointment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can see the appointment that you had . What day do you need to change to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to change to next Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would prefer three o â€™ clock in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will put you down for that time . Thank you for calling to reschedule .
segments.speaker: S2
